events.message: I am filing this claim because my car was involved in a collision during rush hour, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper.
The submitted claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the details of the vehicle collision reported by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the investigation of the auto accident claim filed earlier today.
We confirm receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident and have begun processing it promptly.
Please provide the police report and photos of your damaged car to proceed with the investigation of your accident claim.
All requested documents including accident photos and the official police report have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the cause and extent of the auto accident damage has officially started as per protocol.
The investigation team has completed their assessment of the collision and damage sustained by the vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage limits for your auto accident.
The customer has expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciates the timely response from the insurance team.
After review, the claim has been approved and settlement terms are confirmed for prompt payment to cover repairs.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim has been issued directly to the repair shop to expedite vehicle restoration.
The claim has been officially closed following successful payment and confirmation that repairs are underway.
All records related to the auto accident claim have been archived in accordance with company policy and regulatory requirements.
